abstract: Twitter has removed Jack Dorsey as chief executive. Chairman Evan Williams will replace him.
snippet: Twitter has removed Jack Dorsey as chief executive. Chairman Evan Williams will replace him.
lead_paragraph: (UPDATED 7:24 p.m. Adding Evan Williams’ comment on his personal Twitter stream.)(UPDATED 8:39 p.m. Adding comments from Biz Stone at Twitter and Fred Wilson at Union Square Ventures.)

headline.main: Twitter Sidelines One Founder and Promotes Another

byline.original: By Claire Cain Miller and Vindu Goel
